com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl

Class DefaultClassReflector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl.DefaultClassReflector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassReflector

    public class DefaultClassReflector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassReflector

    This class provides reflection methods for working with classes contained within projects that are using Infinitum.

    Version:
    1.0 03/15/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
